article.name: XML Viewer
article.description:
This test piece was my first go ever at dealing with XML files. After it was complete I felt confident I understood a use for XML files.
All it does, it read a specially formatted XML file, and displays the contents in a visual manner.
Its quite good really! I grabbed some auto-parsing code, but also wrote alot of the stuff myself. I couldn\'t possibly comment on how efficient it is, but it does the job.
This project led onto several other important projects, such as my photo viewers.
article.keywords: xml viewer flash mx script actionscript parsing mkv samurai jack container box folder text notepad
